titleStmt.title: The tragedie of Dido Queene of Carthage played by the Children of her Maiesties Chappell. Written by Christopher Marlowe, and Thomas Nash. Gent. Actors Iupiter. Ganimed. Venus. Cupid. Iuno. Mercurie, or Hermes. Æneas. Ascanius. Dido. Anna. Achates. Ilioneus. Iarbas. Cloanthes. Sergestus.
Dido
titleStmt.author: Marlowe, Christopher, 1564-1593.
Nash, Thomas, 1567-1601. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, by the widdowe Orwin, for Thomas Woodcocke, and are to be solde at his shop, in Paules Church-yeard, at the signe of the blacke Beare,

notesStmt.note: The words "Iupiter. Ganimed .. Cloanthes. Sergestus." are in two columns on the title page.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, in Paules Church-yeard, at the signe of the blacke Beare
